ROOT:
SELECT DISTINCT ctm.companyname, ctm.contactname, ctm.contacttitle FROM orders AS o INNER JOIN customers AS ctm ON o.customerid = ctm.customerid
INNER JOIN
(SELECT * FROM shippers WHERE CompanyName IS NOT NULL AND ShipperID IN (SELECT Distinct(ShipperID) FROM shippers) )
AS s ON o.shipvia = s.shipperid
INNER JOIN
(SELECT * FROM [order details] WHERE ProductID IS NOT NULL AND OrderID IN (SELECT Distinct(OrderID) FROM [order details]) )
AS od ON o.orderid = od.orderid
INNER JOIN
(SELECT * FROM products WHERE ProductName IS NOT NULL AND ProductID IN (SELECT Distinct(ProductID) FROM products) )
AS p ON od.productid = p.productid
INNER JOIN
(SELECT * FROM categories WHERE CategoryName IS NOT NULL AND CategoryID IN (SELECT Distinct(CategoryID) FROM categories) )
AS cgy ON p.categoryid = cgy.categoryid
WHERE s.companyname=@p1 AND cgy.categoryname=@p2
ORDER BY ctm.[]

s1, Boolean, true
if1, Boolean, true

s2, Boolean, false

s3, Boolean, false
if3, Boolean, true

s4, Boolean, true
p2, String, Beverages
COLUMN, companyname
SEQUENCE, DESC
